title: ion-backdrop
body: Backdrops are full screen components that overlay other components. They are useful behind components that transition in on top of other content and can be used to dismiss that component.

props.name: stopPropagation
props.docs: If true, the backdrop will stop propagation on tap.

props.name: tappable
props.docs: If true, the backdrop will can be clicked and will emit the ionBackdropTap event.

docs: Backdrops are full screen components that overlay other components. They are useful behind components that transition in on top of other content and can be used to dismiss that component.

events.docs: Emitted when the backdrop is tapped.
